html:
1.18.21  5:00 pm   i noticed a lot of denoising artifacts in your latest video "here comes the sun". have you heard of intel's AI denoiser? it's really fast and produces really high quality results

      the noise you are seeing is mp4 compression. the renders before that are noiseless. i'm not using a ray trace engine.

1.18.21  4:57 pm   do  you  think  that  3d  graphics  will  become  so  real  that  we  can't  tell  the  difference?

      between what and what

1.18.21  4:56 pm   thank you for the music! have you ever tried recording your audio inside of a cube?

      rectangular prism

1.18.21  4:55 pm   what is your opinion on the sun

      it's ok

1.18.21  4:54 pm   A few years ago I asked you what would happen in the new year (on New Year's) and you said the world would end and start again. Any updates on that?

      that seems like it was taken out of context. the world is constantly starting and ending. that has nothing to do with new years. The main thing that has to do with new years is the calendar, specifically the year number on the calendar

1.18.21  4:53 pm   can you write a song in 5/4

      sure

1.18.21  4:53 pm   is there a single formula for all things in the universe?

      i think so

1.18.21  4:53 pm   What inspired you to do 3D graphics in here comes the sun?

      the actual world, which unfortunately i've still been unable to replicate

1.18.21  4:52 pm   how do you feel about enjoying things critically vs casually? I've had it said to me that if you aren't consuming something actively and critically you might as well not consume it, thoughts?

      there's multi layers to the human mind. There is the layer that thinks (that's the critical layer), then there's all the layers underneath which are purely feels and don't even realize it. Sometimes the critical layer is unable to explain the feelings

1.18.21  4:27 pm   who are your biggest inspirations in music and how did you get to be so funky

      just by observing the world around me

1.18.21  4:26 pm   Welcome back king. One question, how has learning 3D design and art changed how you want to make videos in the future?

      want to make them 2D

1.18.21  4:26 pm   congrats on the new song!! what was the biggest challenge you faced while creating it?

      my brain

1.18.21  4:25 pm   Was the new song truly not good enough for you not to erase it?

      no, that was satire

1.18.21  4:25 pm   i wonder what you're thought process is 

      ever read a casual email that's 10,000 words or more

1.18.21  4:24 pm   is there a stranger strange enough?

      not quite

1.18.21  4:24 pm   So you're back to releasing on YouTube! Are you still going to make 2D videos, though?

      oh hell yeah. i would make 1000 2D videos

1.18.21  4:23 pm   Favorite chord?

      regular

1.18.21  4:22 pm   Why isn't the song good enough?

      perhaps because it was made on...... earth

1.18.21  4:21 pm   Do you like animating in 3D or 2D more?

      what i like best is putting them together

1.18.21  4:21 pm   What's your inspiration behind your new hit song Here Comes The Sun?

      the sun, for sure

1.18.21  4:21 pm   Bill the new song is incredible!

      holy kindness you have friendliness

1.18.21  4:20 pm   Is the 3d art style for "here comes the sun" going to become a staple of your channel going forward?

      some of it

1.18.21  4:20 pm   why did you upload a video today?

      videos are one of my prefered forms of expression

1.18.21  4:19 pm   what inspired your new video

      the song for it

1.18.21  4:19 pm   why did you delete the default cube?

      to make room for some of the other shapes i crave

1.18.21  3:48 pm   favourite county in ireland

      kilkenockimarock

1.18.21  3:45 pm   When will you release your new song 

      jan 19

1.18.21  3:35 pm   have you ever been so upset with yourself that you break into song?

      oh yes

1.18.21  3:32 pm   Is browsing this page at 4am too late?

      no

1.18.21  3:30 pm   what gives you the most inspiration for videos and your music?

      the world

1.18.21  2:59 pm   Can I see the rough draft for "Here comes the sun?"

      sure. these are from 2010 by the way. i'm disappointed that none of these pages have dates on them, but the songs on the surrounding pages are dated 8.10.10

1.18.21  2:59 pm   do you like polyrhythms?

     sure

     if so what's your favorite?

      try it in a song. see how it goes

1.18.21  2:57 pm   How did you come up with Mount St. Helens' personality traits?

     just started with special, and extrapolated outwardly from there, in a step-wise motion

      Are they based on someone you know?

      everyone really

1.18.21  2:40 pm   What key is your new song in?

     G

     (And if you don't want to reveal that much is it in a major or minor key?)

     G major. with verses in Emin. bridge in Bb

1.18.21  2:25 pm   "I'm having a bad day, it's turning into a bad year" (i just did a bad thing) is it still bad?

      i guess that depends who the narrator is, in the story

1.18.21  1:59 pm   What is Steve's real name?

      your name

1.18.21  1:29 pm   what does it take to find happiness?

      this may not be anyone's favorite solution, but, if you are sad for a certain period of time, ....... that sometimes works

1.18.21  12:59 pm   Do you know you are a genre of your own like that movie the grand budapest hotel? Oh sorry this isn't a question I am telling you. But atill, Do you?

      i'm just trying to be...... sensible

1.18.21  12:52 pm   what is one aspect of the new song that most people wouldn't notice on their first few listens.

      i have no idea who notices what. Sometimes i listen to songs i haven't heard for a few years and i notice things i abolutely never noticed before

1.18.21  12:30 pm   When on a hypothetical tour, what instrument would you play on stage?

     different for each song i think. unless someone reminds me to keep it simple

     Also, how would you go about finding people to be in your backing band?

      perhaps i could hire a team of logicians to help me figure it out, and then eventually just decide to use the logicians

1.18.21  11:56 am   Your music lyrics are so stupid but together is sound amazing how do you do it?

      ..................................... *music*

1.18.21  11:21 am   in "and the day goes on" why does the person featured wake up and immediately decides to travel into the sun?

     get a jump on the day

     i'd like to know their motive for such a strange endeavour.

     put yourself in my shoes ..... you've already had that melody written, but 0 lyrics. now you gotta find lyrics that work for that melody. see what i mean

1.18.21  10:46 am   Hey when your next video?

      pretty soon

1.18.21  9:23 am   what if I don't make it as a scientist?

      maybe you could be a linguist

1.18.21  9:18 am   what's your thought about global warming?

      don't forget to also cool the globe at some point

1.18.21  7:35 am   What is your favourite cord progression 

      regular

1.18.21  7:05 am   What is your next song going to be about?

      isolation

1.18.21  6:51 am   Where did the idea for hello sexy pants come from? 

      i'm pretty sure it was about a desk

1.18.21  5:01 am   is this emoticon triggering you? (:
(:= It's an upside down smile. Some people found it triggering because "It's not right" and it's suppose to be ":)".How do you feel about this situation Bill Wurtz sir?

      as triggering as it may be, i have to admit it's less triggering than violence and explosions

1.18.21  2:46 am   How do you learn to make videos and songs like you do?

     one of the most important things to know about myself when doing this is, i seem to pathologically gravitate toward not the quickest way. it can take a hefty team of qualified logicians to steer the ship around

      How do you get the motivation to create videos and songs?

     someone's gotta do it
